koohiiStory1: Since trees eat through their roots, one could imagine roots as tree silverware.
koohiiStory2: The roots of the magical tree are silver.
words:

根拠(こんきょ): basis, foundation
根底(こんてい): root, basis, foundation
根本(こんぽん): origin, source, foundation, root, base, principle
根回し(ねまわし): making necessary arrangements
利根(りこん): intelligence
垣根(かきね): hedge
根(ね): root
羽根(はね): shuttlecock
屋根(やね): roof
